h2_title: Zhu Bajie Boss Fight and Guide - Second Encounter
content: This means you'll have to be even more precise in your dodging, and using spells like Immobilize, Rock Solid, or Cloud Step to avoid attacks you can't roll away from in time.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Zhu_Bajie_(Boss_Fight).md', within the main section titled 'Zhu Bajie (Boss Fight)', specifically from the subsection 'Zhu Bajie Boss Fight and Guide - Second Encounter'.
The content is as follows:
This means you'll have to be even more precise in your dodging, and using spells like Immobilize, Rock Solid, or Cloud Step to avoid attacks you can't roll away from in time.
